Work
Find Computer and in the chair in from of him. Switch on the computer and look at it and work, tying text with the keyboard when needed.


[FIND] <computer> (1.170)
[FIND] <chair> (1.103)
[SIT] <chair> (1.103)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.170)
[TURNTO] <computer> (1.170)
[LOOKAT] <computer> (1.170)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.168)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.168)
